00061 class AISMerge {
00062 private:
00063     AISResources d_ais_db;
00064     HTTPConnect d_http;     // used to access remote resources
00065 
00066     friend class AISMergeTest;
00067 public:
00072     AISMerge(const string &database) throw (AISDatabaseReadFailed) :
00073     d_ais_db(database), d_http(RCReader::instance()) { }
00074 
00077     virtual ~AISMerge() {}
00078 
00079     // Change this when HTTPConnect/HTTPCache are changed.

00081     throw(Error, InternalErr);
